pullrequest.title: issue #857: fix segfault for simbody screw joint when setting limits due to uninitialized limitForce.

content.raw: We should enable some tests to show that this fixes things. Also, it's my understanding that we aren't targeting any more pull requests to `gazebo_3.1`. We can re-target this to `gazebo_4.1`.
content.html: We should enable some tests to show that this fixes things. Also, it's my understanding that we aren't targeting any more pull requests to gazebo_3.1. We can re-target this to gazebo_4.1.
